Title: Missing Kitty
Plot: Gob attempts to make good on his promise to make the family yacht disappear. Meanwhile, Lindsay and Maeby try to track down Lindsay's grandmother, Tobias seeks George Sr.'s respect, and Michael attempts to fire Kitty, who claims to have information that could bring down the company.
GuestStars: James Lipton, Pat Crawford Brown, J. David Krassner, Allan Villaverde
